xwikidoc.name: TodoListMacro
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Todolist Macro
xwikidoc.content:
Macro to display todo-lists using emberjs. This code is based on the emberjs demo. You can see an example below
{{todolist width="50%" center="1" }} Install todolists extension|1 Try todo list demo|0 Create a todo list|0 Close on tasks on this todo list|0 {{/todolist}}

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.contentDescription: List of todos in format Text|1 Text|0 Text|0

property.description: Width of the todolist area in percentage or pixels
Wether the macro should be centered or not (1 or true)
